296DE5C3.Line27.8CA44: Share a drink with me, Deckard! A toast to another life-or-death adventure!

31FCF36D.VoiceDir33.8CA44: Your travelling companion offered you his share of expensive booze.

47ADD91D.Line31.6D03F: No, I… I’ve had quite enough. It’s all yours.

79A41190.VoiceDir27.8CA44: You found some very good booze buried under sand

8F796C41.Line25.8CA44: Could it be? Hah! It is! The gods favor our journey, friends!

97E404EA.VoiceDir31.6D03F: Slightly queasy. You're still hungover from a bender last night.

DFAF980E.VoiceDir25.8CA44: Coming across a pleasant surprise buried under the sand.

E1C6C7A0.Line33.8CA44: Hah! I won’t turn down such generosity!
